turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee drink from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks will you be ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will get it at the Oakland Starbucks on ramapo valley road

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you suggest?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is up to you. What do you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a chai tea latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like it hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a tall

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like it with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes and cinnamon on top

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any coupons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a birthday cake pop and a bottle of water

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I am confirming that you would like to order a tall chai latte hot with whip cream and cinnamon and a cake pop and a bottle of water?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is all

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirmed. Your order will be ready for pick up at 11:15am and the cost is 9.99

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcom
